title: La Botiga dels Fogons
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Organic, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: A slow food vegetarian take away. As of May 2014, daily menu is 9,50â‚¬ (includes 2 main courses and dessert). Dishes offered are hummus, pizzas, caneloni, bagels, in-house-made burgers, of which some are vegan or can be made vegan. Menu is 90% organic. Cozy space with good vibes and vintage decor. Good English is spoken.
